entry.title: VANS SLIP-ER BLACK
entry.summary:
Vendor: VANS
Type: FOOTWEAR
Price: 65.00

Vans The Bomber Tesella is a lightweight lace-up silhouette that utilizes a handwoven leather and coated canvas upper with 15mm inserts that directly reference the iconic Vans checkerboard pattern. Reminiscent of old military styling, the Bomber Tesella also features padded collars, deconstructed heel counters, and UltraCushåª Lite sockliners and outsoles. - http://www.vans.com/shop/tesella-bomber-black-ice-gray
Vans The 2-Tone Suede Lampin, a retro 90s skate style evolved for a modern fit, features suede uppers, scaled sidewalls, metal eyelets, and signature rubber waffle outsoles. - http://www.vans.com/shop/2-tone-suede-lampin-true-white-bla

The Slip-er, inspired by the Vans Classic Slip-On, is an all-terrain slipper featuring textile uppers with the iconic Vans checkerboard print, a synthetic leather outsole wrap, collapsible heels, Pro Vulc Lite construction, and super soft foam and UltraCush sockliners. It also includes blown rubber waffle outsoles and water-based inks and glues.


    
Product Information:

The Canvas Classic Slip-on has a low profile, slip-on canvas upper with elastic side accents, Vans flag label and Vans original Waffle Outsole. - See more at: http://www.vans.com/shop/solid-colors-slip-on-true-white#sthash.PL8dSySa.dpuf
The Canvas Classic Slip-on has a low profile, slip-on canvas upper with elastic side accents, Vans flag label and Vans original Waffle Outsole. - See more at: http://www.vans.com/shop/solid-colors-slip-on-true-white#sthash.PL8dSySa.dpuf
The Canvas Classic Slip-on has a low profile, slip-on canvas upper with elastic side accents, Vans flag label and Vans original Waffle Outsole. - See more at: http://www.vans.com/shop/solid-colors-slip-on-true-white#sthash.PL8dSySa.dpuf
  • Product Code: VN0A3TKRBLK
  • Color: Black
  • Material: Textile / Synthetic

entry.title: ASICS X ATMOS X SOLEBOX GEL LYTE III GLACIER GREY
entry.summary:
Vendor: ASICS
Type: FOOTWEAR
Price: 170.00

The collaboration merges the DNA of both influential partners: While atmos gives the model its own twist through its striking signature snow-tiger-camo pattern, the grey and purple color-scheme reflects both the urban Berlin vibe and the heritage of ASICSTIGER x solebox collaborations. Coming from the 2008 solebox collaboration „The Sun“, parts of the upper further change their color to bright purple once hit by UV light, further used as accent color. Some upscale details accomplish the conspicuous design. The lace-tips as well as the backside got printed with both an atmos and solebox logo while the sole is partially icy on the heels and further features embedded emblems. The GEL-LYTE III comes with a smooth leather lining inside which ensures an exclusive appearance and provides convenience while wearing.



Product Information:

  • Product Code: 1191A076.020
  • Color: Glacier Grey / Stone Grey
  • Material: Nylon / Leather

entry.title: REIGNING CHAMP MIDWEIGHT FULL ZIP HOODIE CRIMSON
entry.summary:
Vendor: REIGNING CHAMP
Type: APPAREL
Price: 135.00

A classic zip hoodie in Ivy League-inspired Crimson. Made in Canada from our signature Midweight Terry, with low abrasion flatlocked seams, set-in/raglan sleeves and 100% cotton rib. Heavy gauge two-way YKK zipper is finished with a monogrammed zipper pull.
   

Product Information:

  • Product Code: RC-3205-CRM
  • Color: Crimson
  • Material: Cotton

Styled with:

  • Braindead Matte Lock Carpenter Pant Natural
  • Adidas Yung 1 Core Black

entry.summary:
Vendor: REIGNING CHAMP
Type: APPAREL
Price: 115.00

Reigning Champ's signature crewneck sweater in Ivy League-inspired Crimson. Made in Canada from premium quality Midweight Terry, with low abrasion flatlocked seams, set-in/raglan sleeves and durable 100% cotton rib.
   

Product Information:

  • Color: Crimson

Styled with:

entry.title: DR MARTENS X NEEDLES 1460 SUEDE DESERT OASIS
entry.summary:
Vendor: DR MARTENS
Type: FOOTWEAR
Price: 260.00

This Made in England collaboration with Japanese clothing label Needles sees three reinterpretations of this classic 8-eye silhouette. Brogue toe-cap detailing and a medial zip with zip guard give this version of the 1460 a modern feel. And the materials – Smooth black leather, Smooth oxblood leather, and sandy suede – elevate these Docs to premium status. Contrast laces on each boot give them real stand-out. Tonal laces are also included. The signature Goodyear welt and AirWair™ technology provide all the durability and comfort you'd expect from Docs.

 


Product information:

  • Product Code: 24397273
  • Color: Desert Oasis
  • Material: Suede

entry.title: ADIDAS POD-S3.1 BLACK SOLAR RED
entry.summary:
Vendor: ADIDAS
Type: FOOTWEAR
Price: 130.00

The P.O.D. System brings the best of '90s cushioning to today's streets. These shoes blend adidas heritage inspiration with a knit upper that has a snug, supportive feel. Distinctive Boost midsole Boost is our most responsive cushioning ever P.O.D. System This '90s-era design is a modular midsole fitted together from different materials: Today's version puts Boost in the heel, high-rebound EVA in the forefoot, and a TPU midfoot bridge for support and structure.


Product Information:
  • Product Code: B28080
  • Color: Core Black / Core Black /Solar Red
  • Material: Knit

entry.title: ADIDAS MICROPACER X R1 METALLIC SILVER
entry.summary:
Vendor: ADIDAS
Type: FOOTWEAR
Price: 200.00 - 200000.00 (13 variants)

These suede and leather shoes are a hybrid of retro and modern adidas designs. They take tooling from the NMD R1 and combine it with the vintage tech look of the 1984 Micropacer, born during an era when wearable technology was an exciting new concept. Boost cushioning offers energy return in every stride.

Product Information:
  • Product Code: G26778
  • Color: Metallic Silver / Light Blue / Cloud White
  • Material: Leather

entry.title: ADIDAS 98 X CRAZY BYW CORE BLACK
entry.summary:
Vendor: ADIDAS
Type: FOOTWEAR
Price: 170.00

Worn by legendary athletes, this '90s B-ball design created a sneaker fan frenzy with a look so unconventional that it was called crazy. Now a footwear fashion series, these shoes continue to push the limits with engineering that redefines classic basketball style. Made of soft, lightweight mesh and detailed with leather overlays.


Product Information:
  • Product Code: G26807
  • Color: Core Black / Grey / Core White
  • Material: Leather / Synthetic

entry.title: ADIDAS COUNTRY X KAMANDA RUNNING WHITE
entry.summary:
Vendor: ADIDAS
Type: FOOTWEAR
Price: 170.00

A modern hybrid inspired by retro running and football styles, these shoes feature the nylon-and-suede upper of the '70s Country running design. The midsole comes from the Kamanda, a modern shoe with a design that riffs off the Samba's iconic tread pattern. The breathable trainers have a soft and lightweight feel.

Product Information:
  • Product Code: G26797
  • Color: Running White / Collegiate Green / Gum
  • Material: Suede / Nylon

entry.title: ADIDAS ZX930XEQT FUTURE HYDRO
entry.summary:
Vendor: ADIDAS
Type: FOOTWEAR
Price: 170.00

Two legendary '80s adidas shoe series unite. These shoes are made of a mix of lightweight mesh and soft suede. They combine the finely tuned ZX 930 running design with the moulded EQT midsole. Boost cushioning offers energy return in every stride.

Product Information:
  • Product Code: G26806
  • Color: Future Hydro / Silver Metallic / Ash Silver
  • Material: Suede / Mesh

entry.title: ADIDAS CALABASAS TRACKPANT LUNA
entry.summary:
Vendor: ADIDAS
Type: APPAREL
Price: 120.00

Constructed of double-knit polyester fabrication, featuring an elastic waistband with draw cord and zipped side pockets. Contrasting Three Stripes branding line the legs, with the Calabasas logo hits down the right leg and just below the waist line.

ALL SALES FINAL. ONE PER CUSTOMER.

Product Information:
  • Product Code: DY0572
  • Color: Luna / Wolves
  • Material: Polyester

entry.title: BLENDS X G-SHOCK DW5600
entry.summary:
Vendor: BLENDS
Type: ACCESSORIES
Price: 160.00

To celebrate G-Shock’s 35th anniversary, we partnered up with G-Shock for a special take on the DW-5600 model. This particular muted all black DW-5600 features a black IP buckle, black face cage, reverse LCD display and subtle branding on the back of the watch’s strap keeper. The watch comes packaged in a sleek, vacuum sealed opaque, bag.


ONE PER CUSTOMER. MULTIPLE ORDERS WILL BE CANCELED. ALL SALES FINAL.


Product Information:

  • Product Code: DW5600BB-1BL
  • Color: Black
